scripts.bootstrap: f () { npm ci && lerna link && lerna bootstrap --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} && lerna link && npm run build:travis ;}; f
scripts.start: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run start ;}; f
scripts.serve: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run serve ;}; f
scripts.build: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run build ${@:2} ;}; f
scripts.build:travis: lerna exec --scope deriv-shared --scope deriv-components --scope deriv-translations -- npm run build:travis
scripts.build:local: lerna exec --scope deriv-trader --scope deriv-bot --parallel -- npm run build
scripts.test: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} --parallel -- npm run test ;}; f
scripts.test:eslint: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run test:eslint ;}; f
scripts.test:stylelint: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run test:stylelint ;}; f
scripts.test:mocha: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run test:mocha ;}; f
scripts.translate: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-translations -- npm run translate ;}; f
scripts.deploy: f () { npm run build:local && lerna exec --scope deriv-core -- npm run deploy ${@:1} ;}; f
scripts.deploy:clean: f () { npm run build:local && lerna exec --scope deriv-core -- npm run deploy:clean ${@:1} ;}; f
scripts.deploy:folder: f () { npm run build:local && lerna exec --scope deriv-core -- npm run deploy:folder ${@:1} ;}; f
scripts.deploy:staging: lerna exec --scope deriv-core -- npm run deploy:staging
scripts.deploy:production: lerna exec --scope deriv-core -- npm run deploy:production
